import { Avatar, Breadcrumbs, Button, Link, TextField, Typography } from '@mui/material'; import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "./AddProduct.css"; import Header from '../../../Header/Header'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function AddProduct() { /* const [product, setproduct] = useState({ productId: '', productName: '', productImageUrl: '', productDescription: '', productLocation: '', productCapacity: '', productDataarr: [] });*/ const breadcrumbs = [ Admin , { navigate("/admin/viewproduct")}} > Products , Add Product ]; return (
{breadcrumbs}
) }
